S

Sensor - Class in cs.tcd.ie
Client class an instance accepts user input, sends packets and receivers ACK packets.
SensorInfoContent - Class in cs.tcd.ie
SensorInfoContent class this class is an extension of packetContent an includes methods for extracting data from the packet
SENSORPACKET - Static variable in class cs.tcd.ie.PacketContent
 
SEQ_NUMBER_LENGTH - Static variable in class cs.tcd.ie.PacketContent
 
Server - Class in cs.tcd.ie
Server class an instance receivers packets, sends ACK packets and keeps track of clients and sequence numbers; will send ACK or NAK to client depending on received packet
setErrorFlag(byte[]) - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets ErrorFlag to input byte[].
setErrorFlagOff() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets ErrorFlag to off.
setErrorFlagOn() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets ErrorFlag to on.
setId(int) - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets the id of the packet to SENSORPACKET.
setNxtSeqNr(int) - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.Server
Sets the sequence of the packet to nxtSeqNr.
setSequenceNumber(int) - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets the sequence of the packet to nxtSeqNr.
setTypeACK() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets the type of the packet to ACKPACKET.
setTypeSensor() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.SensorInfoContent
Sets the type of the packet to SENSORPACKET.
SRC_ADDRESS_LENGTH - Static variable in class cs.tcd.ie.PacketContent
 
start() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.Gateway
Initializes the gateway to wait for packets.
start() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.Sensor
Sender Method will create and send the first packet from the sensor also initializes the timeout length
start() - Method in class cs.tcd.ie.Server
Initializes the server to wait for packets.
